header.subtitle: introduction
header.text: Say Hi to **Nicolas**, Web Developer and Photographer.

introduction.description: I design and code beautifully simple things and i love what i do. Just simple like that!

header.subtitle: about
header.text: From construction to web development: **an exciting transition!**

about.description: I am passionate about this new stage of my career and look forward to working with you to bring your ideas and goals to life online. Feel free to browse my portfolio to discover some of my past projects.

list.title: Internship
list.subtitle: Internship at 'Agence-d.ca' - Personnel placement startup. Contributions to web page creation and involvement in deploying their in-house CMS.

descriptions.line: Technologies: React, Laravel, MySQL, MUI
Version control software: GIT
AGILE methodology: Development of dynamic web pages using React to provide an immersive and responsive user experience.
Active collaboration in setting up an in-house CMS based on Laravel and MySQL to efficiently manage website content and features.
Experience with Mui framework to design modern and user-friendly interfaces, thereby enhancing the product's usability and accessibility.

list.title: Student, End-of-Program Project
list.subtitle: Creation of a responsive mobile website in a team

descriptions.line: Technology: React, Laravel, MySQL, Tailwind
Version control software: Git
AGILE methodology, using Scrumdesk
Design and prototyping
Gathering client requirements, creating a specification document.

list.title: Student, School Project
list.subtitle: Execution of projects as part of the training

descriptions.line: Technology: Skilled in React, Vue.js, Laravel, MySQl,JavaScript, PHP, Tailwind CSS, HTML5, and CSS for versatile web development.
Version control software: Proficient in Git for effective code management and seamless team collaboration.
Project management: Organizing, coordinating, and leading teams to ensure successful project execution.
Monitoring project design and client relations: Overseeing project development and maintaining strong client relationships.
Technical support during implementation and deployment planning: Providing expertise to facilitate smooth implementation and deployment.
Technical support and operational assistance during network failures: Offering prompt assistance during network issues to ensure uninterrupted operations.
Building client relationships for business development: Fostering strong client connections to support business growth.
Inspect, monitor, test, and deploy transmission and distribution systems: Conducting thorough inspections, efficient testing, and successful implementation of both optical fiber and copper networks.

Communicate and coordinate the development and completion of work: Facilitating effective communication among team members to ensure seamless coordination in project development and timely completion of tasks.
Accomplishment of individual and team projects: Deliver diverse projects, showcasing strong teamwork, project management, and client relationship skills.
Designing and maintaining websites: Monitoring project design, client relationship.
Creating visually appealing and functional websites, utilizing programming expertise and robust database management.
Learning in-demand technologies in the market: Actively pursuing knowledge in cutting-edge technologies like React, Vue.js, and Laravel to stay ahead in the dynamic market.
Electrical Equipment Installer: Skilled in safely and efficiently installing various electrical equipment and systems, ensuring compliance with regulations and industry standards.
Commissioning and Maintenance of Systems: Experienced in the meticulous setup, testing, and maintenance of electrical systems to optimize performance and minimize downtime.
Reading and Interpreting Plans or Diagrams: Proficient in deciphering complex electrical plans and diagrams, facilitating accurate implementation and troubleshooting.

mars.title: Mars Project
mars.subtitle: Create a statistical website with Laravel.
mars.description:
The project must have at least 4 routes pointed to the controller.
Have a form and use the POST method.
Process the received data and display it on a page.
Work with a 'Master' file and use 'blade' for views.

faceMaisonneuve.title: FaceMaisonneuve Project
faceMaisonneuve.subtitle: Create a student discussion website.
faceMaisonneuve.description:
Generate 15 cities, 100 students, and 10 articles using Faker Factory.
Implement methods to display, create, modify, and delete a student and/or article.
Create a login page with encrypted password.
Set up a multilingual system.

meteo.title: Weather Project
meteo.subtitle: Create a single page application with REST
meteo.description:
Create a nodeJS server.
Retrieve data from an API of our choice.
Update the JSON file when the server is launched.
Create pages to display different information returned by the API.

stampee.title: Stampee Project
stampee.subtitle: Create a multi-page auction site.
stampee.description:
Create visual identity, HTML and CSS pages, and a database.
The project should be MVC-based but without a framework.
Ability to create an account, modify it, create an ad, and bid on sales.
